solution_line_template: He runs at .1 miles per minute because {music_speed_mph} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{music_speed_mph}/{minutes_per_hour}={music_speed_mpm}>>{music_speed_mpm}
While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because {album_length_min} x {music_speed_mpm} = <<{album_length_min}*{music_speed_mpm}={miles_with_music}>>{miles_with_music}
He has to run 2 miles without the album because {total_distance} - {miles_with_music} = <<{total_distance}-{miles_with_music}={miles_without_music}>>{miles_without_music}
Without music he runs 1/15 miles per minute because {no_music_speed_mph} / {minutes_per_hour} = 1/15
He will run the remaining 2 miles in 30 minutes because {miles_without_music} / ({no_music_speed_mpm}) = <<{miles_without_music}/({no_music_speed_mpm})={time_without_music}>>{time_without_music}
It will take him 70 minutes in total because {album_length_min} + {time_without_music} =<<{album_length_min}+{time_without_music}={total_time}>>{total_time}
